类 com.jdon.model.ModelForm

com.jdon.model 中 ModelForm 的使用
 

返回 ModelForm 的 com.jdon.model 中的方法
 ModelForm ModelHandler.initForm(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          Presentation layer need a ModelForm instance that include some initially data, these data must obtain from service.
 

参数类型为 ModelForm 的 com.jdon.model 中的方法
 void ModelHandler.formCopyToModel(ModelForm form, Model model)
          for old version below 1.4
 void ModelHandler.formCopyToModelIF(ModelForm form, java.lang.Object model)
          ModelForm object's data transfer to Model object default implemention is copy mapping between with them; another implemention: String propertyName = StringUtil.getLastString(model.getClass().getName()); Model hasDataModel = PropertyUtils.getProperty(form, propertyName); model = hasDataModel; extends this class , and override this method
 java.lang.Object ModelHandler.initModelIF(EventModel em, ModelForm form, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          Presentation layer need a ModelForm instance that include some initially data, these data must obtain from service.
 void ModelHandler.modelCopyToForm(Model model, ModelForm form)
          for old version below 1.4
 void ModelHandler.modelIFCopyToForm(java.lang.Object model, ModelForm form)
          Model object's data transfer to ModelForm object default implemention is copy mapping between with them; another implemention is : PropertyUtils.setProperty extends this class , and override this method
 

com.jdon.model.handler 中 ModelForm 的使用
 

参数类型为 ModelForm 的 com.jdon.model.handler 中的方法
 java.lang.Object XmlModelHandler.initModelIF(EventModel em, ModelForm form, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          if your application need initialize the ModelForm, this method is a option.

返回 ModelForm 的 com.jdon.strutsutil 中的方法
static ModelForm FormBeanUtil.getModelForm(org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping actionMapping, org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm actionForm, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
           
protected  ModelForm ModelSaveAction.getModelForm(ModelHandler modelHandler, org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm actionForm, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          get a ModelForm or create it.
 

参数类型为 ModelForm 的 com.jdon.strutsutil 中的方法
static EventModel FormBeanUtil.createEvent(ModelForm form, java.lang.Object model)
          create a EventModel from a existed ModelForm.
 

com.jdon.strutsutil.util 中 ModelForm 的使用
 

参数类型为 ModelForm 的 com.jdon.strutsutil.util 中的方法
 void CreateViewPageUtil.doCreate(org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping actionMapping, ModelForm modelForm, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          create a ModelForm object two things: 1. create a ModelForm null instance 2. initial ModelForm instance value, obtain a inital Model instance copy the Model instance to the ModelForm instance obtaining datas two ways: 1.call ModelHandler initForm method; 2.call Modelhandler initModel method;
 java.lang.Object EditeViewPageUtil.getModelForEdit(org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping actionMapping, ModelForm modelForm, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          two things: 1. create a ModelForm null instance 2. obtain a existed Model instance copy the Model instance to the ModelForm instance
